chart_metadata.name: aria2
chart_metadata.description: Lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source, cross platform download utility .

runAsContext.description: aria2 requires root privileges to run chown process.

capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: Collabora and Nginx are able to chown files.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: Nginx is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: Nginx is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to bypass permission checks.

capabilities.name: FOWNER
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for Aria2.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Aria2.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

1.0.2.app_readme:
Aria2

Aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source, cross platform download utility operated in command-line. It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent and Metalink.
1.0.2.detailed_readme:
Aria2

Aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source, cross platform download utility operated in command-line. It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent and Metalink.
